name: Session
desc: Information the client provides about a sequence of requests and responses to process an intent.

items.name: identifier
items.desc: A stable identifier for all requests and responses relating to a specific intent.

items.name: constraints
items.desc: Client limitations on content quantity and type that apply to all responses your service makes for this session.

items.name: requested
items.desc: The time the user initiates the request.

items.name: deadline
items.desc: The time by which the client expects a response from your service to provide a real-time interaction with the user.

items.name: playerContext
items.desc: Information about content the client is playing, if any.

items.name: version
items.desc: The version of the SiriKitMediaAPI library the client is using.
